title: "Back to the Second Future" correctly predicted by the Cabs World World World World World World World Works series in 2015?
subtitle: The 1989 film "Back to the Second Future" did not correctly predict that Chicago would be the winner of the 2015 Cubs Marlins World Championship.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The second-coming film in 1987 correctly predicted that the Florida Marlins would win the World Series in 1997 and that the Cobbs would play Florida in the 2015 World Series.
